Factor.name: visibility
Factor.definition: 1 if the current visibility is >= the required visibility; otherwise it is the ratio of the current to required visibility

Factor.name: wind
Factor.definition: 1 if the current wind velocity is higher than the maximum required to achieve the desired pointing; otherwise it is the ratio of the maximum to the current wind velocity.

Factor.name: priority
Factor.definition: The scientific priority assigned by the TAC.
